entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.3°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7 except plus 4 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 7 except plus 4 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17 except minus 10 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17 except minus 10 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2 except plus 5 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 2 except plus 5 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023
